  • SKILL for Codemirror
  • View page source

SKILL for Codemirror¶

This extension provides a SKILL mode for CodeMirror editor.

The extension adds a MIME type x-skill and a mode skill that can be used with CodeMirror.

About SKILL¶

From Wikipedia: SKILL is a Lisp dialect used as a scripting language and PCell (parameterized cells) description language used in many EDA software suites by Cadence Design Systems (e.g. Cadence Allegro and Cadence Virtuoso)

Notes¶

This extension was written to enhance the Virtuoso kernel for Jupyter (https://github.com/benvarkey/JuVi).
